PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 presenting with NSTEMI and cardiogenic shock.
Underwent percutaneous coronary intervention on 09/19/2024, and Impella support initiated on 09/22/2024.
Condition complicated by infection, leukocytosis, and pressure injury.

Medications: Amiodarone IV for maintaining sinus rhythm
Dual antiplatelet therapy with aspirin and ticagrelor
Milrinone IV for cardiac output support
ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024 after lengthy ICU stay with guarded prognosis.

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Patient had elevated WBC and was on broad-spectrum antibiotics for possible sepsis. No organism isolated in cultures.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: One unit of packed cells transfused to maintain hemoglobin above 8.
